name: Narrow Your Scope
description:
THIS IS A VR ONLY GAME BUILT FOR THE OCULUS GO!

"Narrow Your Scope" is a game about turning big game ideas into more manageable ones.

    The game is built upon the concept that the player is a game developer being pitched an overly complex and complicated game idea and must pick only the parts that they think will allow the game to be finished on time and do well critically. In "Narrow Your Scope", the player is presented with a number of cards each representing aspects of a game idea. Each card has a value, but that value is also its cost. The player must then choose between 3 and 6 cards to "make a game" from. Once they have picked out the most valuable parts, they hit a big red button and are judged based on a number of factors including the number of ideas included and combined cost of all features.
